thread.title: `Buffy the Vampire Slayer` star Nicholas Brendon arrested over domestic violence charges
thread.title_full: `Buffy the Vampire Slayer` star Nicholas Brendon arrested over domestic violence charges - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: `Buffy the Vampire Slayer` star Nicholas Brendon arrested over domestic violence charges
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 2(ANI): 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer' star Nicholas Brendon has been arrested over the charges of domestic violence .*
Washington D.C., Oct. 2(ANI): 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer' star Nicholas Brendon has been arrested over the charges of domestic violence. According to sources, Police was called to a hotel in Saratoga Springs, New York after the 44-year-old actor choked her girlfriend, who came to drop his belongings, reports E! Online. A police spokesperson said that Brendon refused to let off her girlfriend and pinned her against the wall after an argument over his cell phone and keys. The actor has been charged with a third-degree robbery, a felony, two counts of criminal mischief and one count of obstruction of breathing. (ANI) Â»
